# marmot Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "marmot" {
  host    = "your-marmot-host.com"
  api_key = "your-api-key"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Marmot API key for authentication
- `host` (String) Marmot API host URL
